## Description {#details}

AMDHSA kernel descriptor MCExpr struct for use in MC layer.

Uses <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdhsakerneldescriptor-h">AMDHSAKernelDescriptor.h</a> for sizes and constants.
